description: These are all of the settings for the game of Tank Tactics. For more information about each setting, run the command `settings get <setting>`.

border_width.description: The width of the borders between cells, in pixels.

border_color.description: The color of the borders between cells.

cell_size.description: The length and width of the cells.

gameplay.description: Settings that affect the rules of the game.

fire_range.description: The maximum number of squares away from the player (diagonals measured as 1) another tank can be while remaining in range of the player.

action_grant_time.description: The time where action points are given out. This time is in the time zone of the server.

jury_bonus_minimum.description: The minimum number of jurors that must vote for a player in order for that player to receive an extra action point.

daily_actions.description: The number of action points that players are given each day.

creation.description: Settings that control the creation of the game.

personal_space_size.description: The length and height of the square area designated for each player's initial position.

player_minimum.description: The game will not start unless the player minimum has been reached.

player_maximum.description: The game will automatically start when this threshold is reached. Set this setting to null if no player maximum is desired.

initial_health.description: The health value players have at the beginning of the game.

initial_actions.description: The number of action points that players have at the beginning of the game.
